description: Oksana confides in a trusted friend about the risks of more chaos and her doubts about the city's readiness for the truth.
She discreetly authorizes the Mosaic Reversion protocol, causing all BCI scores to revert before anyone else can access the archive.
BCI scores revert overnight to 2022 levels under the Mosaic Reversion protocol. Panic surges as identities and privileges swap; confusion sweeps workplaces and services.
